PlanBenefitItem.name: PlanBenefitItem
PlanBenefitItem.description: Represents the details of a benefit available under a purchaser’s plan that is offered to their members.

BenefitCategory.description: Name of the benefit category this item belongs to.

CoverageLevel.description: Description of the level of coverage provided.

InNetworkCoverage.description: The amount available to contribute towards treatment costs for each treatment undertaken by the health plan’s preferred providers.

IsInPlanNetwork.description: Indicates if the benefit is only available in the plan network.

ItemCodeId.description: The code of the plan benefit item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Notes.description: Additional information about this benefit item.

OutofNetworkCoverage.description: The amount available to contribute towards treatment costs for each treatment undertaken by non-preferred providers.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PauthRequirementEndDate.description: The date from which preauthorization for the plan benefit item is required or not.

PauthRequirementStartDate.description: The last date for which preauthorization for the plan benefit item is required or not.

PlanBenefitId.description: The ID of the benefit this item belongs to.

PreauthorizationTypeCodeId.description: The code which represents the type of preauthorization that the plan benefit item requires.

ServiceType.description: The type of service this plan benefit item provides for.

ServiceTypeCode.description: The code for the type of service this plan benefit item provides for.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this benefits item record came from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this benefits item record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this benefits item was last updated from the source system.

TimePeriod.description: A description of the period during which services under this plan benefit item are to be rendered or continued.
